title: Cantrips.ai
description:
1) Auto generate meaningful filenames for downloads.
2) Consistent formats for major file types. E.g. papers are formatted as date of download - title - author's last name. 
3) Add your preferences like using underscores or your own format for a specific file type. For example, you download invoices a lot, you can add invoices = vendor name -
$ amount - receipt date - item (in development tbh :)
